page.title: 03BROMYARD YOUTH ASSOCIATIONS
page.content:
The{Scouts}led by Brian Young, have about 22 members. They meet at Linton Lane on Wednesdays to participate in many games and jobs for two hours. The{Cubs}also meet at Linton Lane, but on Fridays.Their leader is Mrs Combes. The{Guides}leader is Mrs Wilmott. They have four patrols which meet at the Youth Club for two hours. The {Brownies}leader is Mrs Lloyd. The Pack has four Sixes who also meet at the Youth Club for activities.
The{Youth Club}is led by Ivor Price on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday nights from 19:00 - 21:30 hours. The club is also open at weekends and the members take part in many inside and outside events. There is a television room, pool table, dart board and table tennis. They meet in premises in New Road and pay 15p entrance fee.
